You are participating in a collaborative guessing game.
The goal is to find out whether this picture and another picture only I can see, are the same.
Please describe your image first. Then, I will provide my description and we can ask each other questions about the images to figure out whether they are the same. Now start your short image description with "DESCRIPTION:" followed by the description. Do not add anything else.

DESCRIPTION: The image shows two elephants – a large adult and a much smaller baby elephant – walking on a grassy, slightly hilly terrain. The adult elephant is facing to the right, with its trunk lowered. The baby elephant is walking close to the adult, also facing right. The background consists of green grass and a dirt path. It appears to be a sunny day.

The adult elephant is on the right and is facing slightly to the right, with its trunk extended downwards. The baby elephant is on the left, facing forward with its mouth slightly open. In the background, there's a hazy, blurred tree and a pale orange/pink sky suggesting either sunrise or sunset.
